name: Monster Creator
description:
How to play:

  • WASD / Arrow keys to move
  • Click to kill a villager
  • Collect the dead body part
  • Go to the house
  • Combine parts to make a monster

What the game is:

The game, baced off Mary Shelly's Frankenstein, follows a person that collects body parts to create a monster by combining the pieces and re-animating them with electrisity. However, due to problems in the code with the inventory, you cannot see the parts you have collected and combine them, but rather see how many parts you have.

The game has 2 origanal songs, and a few sound effects.
